meaning list.meaning: ຫນຶ່ງ (ບົດຄວາມທີ່ບໍ່ມີກໍານົດ)
meaning list.sentence: She bought a book from the store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ປື້ມຈາກຮ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃດໆ (ບົດຄວາມທີ່ບໍ່ມີກໍານົດ)
meaning list.sentence: A dog was barking outside.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາ​ໃດ​ຢູ່​ນອກ​ໄດ້​ເຫາະ.

meaning list.sentence: The book is about ancient civilizations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມນີ້ແມ່ນກ່ຽວກັບອາລະຍະທໍາບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະມານ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting will last about two hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ຈະ​ໃຊ້​ເວ​ລາ​ປະ​ມານ​ສອງ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ​.

meaning list.sentence: There were papers scattered about the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານຖືກກະແຈກກະຈາຍຢູ່ກາງຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດ, ຂ້າງເທິງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The airplane flew above the clouds.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນໄດ້ບິນຢູ່ເໜືອເມກ.

meaning list.sentence: He lives in the apartment above.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອາໃສຢູ່ໃນຮາບພຽງຊັ້ນເທິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນລະດັບທີ່ສູງກວ່າ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Her scores were above average.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະແນນຂອງລາວສູງກວ່າຄ່າສະເລ່ຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າມ, ອີກດ້ານໜຶ່ງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The bank is across the street.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຄານແມ່ນຂ້າມຖະຫນົນ.

meaning list.sentence: They traveled across the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເດີນທາງໄປທົ່ວປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ດ້ານກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She swam across to the other side of the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລອຍຂ້າມໜອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The movie is full of action scenes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍ scenes ປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ຄະ​ດີ
meaning list.sentence: He decided to take legal action against the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຈະດໍາເນີນການທາງກົດຫມາຍຕໍ່ບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກິດ​ຈະ​ກໍາ​, ກິດ​ຈະ​ກໍາ​
meaning list.sentence: The kids enjoyed the outdoor activities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມັກກິດຈະກໍາກາງແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເຄື່ອນ​ໄຫວ​, ມີ​ຊີ​ວິດ​
meaning list.sentence: There was a lot of activity in the marketplace.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີກິດຈະກໍາຫຼາຍໃນຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.sentence: The actor won an award for his performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນສໍາລັບການສະແດງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The actress starred in a famous movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງຍິງໄດ້ມີບົດບາດນໍາຫນ້າໃນຮູບເງົາທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເພີ່ມ, ເພີ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: Please add some sugar to my coffee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເພີ່ມ້ໍາຕານໃສ່ກາເຟຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມ (ຄະນິດສາດ)
meaning list.sentence: If you add five and three, you get eight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າທ່ານເພີ່ມຫ້າແລະສາມ, ທ່ານຈະໄດ້ຮັບແປດ.

meaning list.sentence: He wrote his address on the form.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນແບບຟອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເວົ້າ, ທີ່ຢູ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The president gave an inspiring address.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະທານ​ປະ​ເທດ​ໄດ້​ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ທີ່​ດົນ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: to address, to address (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The president addressed the nation on television.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະທານາທິບໍດີ​ກ່າວ​ຕໍ່​ປະ​ເທດ​ຊາດ​ທາງ​ໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.sentence: This book is for adults only.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມນີ້ແມ່ນສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຫຍ່ເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: This movie is suitable for adult audiences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົານີ້ແມ່ນເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບຜູ້ຊົມຜູ້ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ແນະ​ນໍາ​, ຄໍາ​ແນະ​ນໍາ​
meaning list.sentence: She gave me some useful advice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຫ້ຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ເປັນປະໂຫຍດແກ່ຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ, ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: She is afraid of spiders.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢ້ານແມງມຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະວົນກະວາຍ
meaning list.sentence: I’m afraid we’re late for the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຢ້ານວ່າພວກເຮົາຈະມາຊ້າສຳລັບກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.sentence: We went to the park after lunch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກອາຫານທ່ຽງພວກເຮົາໄດ້ໄປສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັງ, ຫຼັງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: He ran after the bus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແລ່ນຕາມລົດເມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: We went out after it stopped raining.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ຝົນ​ຢຸດ​ເຊົາ​, ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ອອກ​ໄປ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ້ວ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He arrived shortly after.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມາຮອດບໍ່ດົນຫລັງຈາກນັ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: Let's meet in the afternoon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຕອນບ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອີກເທື່ອຫນຶ່ງ, ອີກເທື່ອຫນຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Can you explain that again?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດອະທິບາຍເລື່ອງນີ້ອີກຄັ້ງໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: What is your age?
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຍຸຂອງເຈົ້າແມ່ນຫຍັງ?

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸກ, ຍຸກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The stone age is a prehistoric period.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍຸກຫີນແມ່ນຍຸກກ່ອນປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ່, ກາຍເປັນລ້າສະໄຫມ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Wine ages better when stored properly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫຼົ້າແວງມີອາຍຸດີກວ່າເມື່ອເກັບຮັກສາຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນ (ການສະແດງອອກເວລາ)
meaning list.sentence: She left the house two hours ago.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອອກຈາກເຮືອນສອງຊົ່ວໂມງກ່ອນຫນ້ານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກລົງ, ຕົກລົງ
meaning list.sentence: I agree with your opinion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຫັນດີກັບຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: They agreed to meet at 6 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຕົກລົງທີ່ຈະພົບກັນໃນເວລາ 6 ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາບອາກາດ
meaning list.sentence: The air is fresh in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາກາດສະອາດໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: They traveled by air to New York.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເດີນທາງໄປນິວຢອກໂດຍທາງອາກາດ.

meaning list.sentence: We arrived at the airport early.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາມາຮອດສະຫນາມບິນໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັງໝົດ, ທັງໝົດ (ຕົວກຳນົດ)
meaning list.sentence: All students passed the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນທຸກຄົນຜ່ານການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຸກຄົນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: All were happy with the decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກຄົນມີຄວາມສຸກກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.sentence: All the tickets were sold out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີ້ທັງໝົດຖືກຂາຍໝົດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນີ້, ໃນເວລາດຽວກັນ
meaning list.sentence: She is a doctor and also a writer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທ່ານຫມໍແລະຍັງເປັນຜູ້ຂຽນ.

meaning list.sentence: She always wakes up early.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕື່ນແຕ່ເຊົ້າສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງມະຫັດ, ປະຫລາດໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The view from the mountain is amazing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະຈາກພູເຂົາແມ່ນສິ່ງມະຫັດ.

meaning list.sentence: She likes apples and oranges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຫມາກໂປມແລະຫມາກກ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຈຮ້າຍ, ໃຈຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: He was angry because he missed the bus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຈຮ້າຍເພາະວ່າລາວພາດລົດເມ.

meaning list.sentence: The zoo has a variety of animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີສັດຕ່າງໆຢູ່ໃນສວນສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອີກອັນນຶ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Would you like another cup of tea?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງການຊາອີກຈອກບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: His answer to the question was correct.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາຕອບຂອງຄໍາຖາມແມ່ນຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕອບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She answered the phone quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕອບໂທລະສັບໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີ, ໃດໆ (ຕົວກໍານົດ)
meaning list.sentence: Do you have any questions?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າມີຄຳຖາມບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ເຄີຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Do you have any questions?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າມີຄຳຖາມບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: I don’t have any money.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ມີເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີໃຜ, ໃຜ
meaning list.sentence: Does anyone know the answer?
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີໃຜຮູ້ຄໍາຕອບບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: Is there anything I can do to help?
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີສິ່ງໃດແດ່ທີ່ຂ້ອຍສາມາດຊ່ວຍໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ອາພາດເມັນ (ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ)
meaning list.sentence: They moved into a new apartment last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ໃນອາພາດເມັນໃຫມ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.sentence: I ate an apple for breakfast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍກິນຫມາກໂປມເປັນອາຫານເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: Her birthday is in April.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັນເດືອນປີເກີດຂອງລາວແມ່ນໃນເດືອນເມສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂດ​ພື້ນ​ທີ່​, ພາກ​ພື້ນ​
meaning list.sentence: This area is known for its natural beauty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນນີ້ເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄວາມງາມທໍາມະຊາດຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.sentence: He broke his arm while playing basketball.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫັກແຂນຂອງລາວໃນຂະນະທີ່ຫຼີ້ນບ້ວງ.

meaning list.sentence: The kids were running around the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍແລ່ນອ້ອມສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.sentence: He arrived around 3 PM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມາຮອດປະມານສາມໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຮອດ, ສາມາດບັນລຸ
meaning list.sentence: They arrived at the hotel late at night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າມາຮອດໂຮງແຮມຕອນກາງຄືນ.

meaning list.sentence: The gallery exhibits modern art.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງສະແດງສິລະປະທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.sentence: She wrote an article about climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນບົດຄວາມກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົດຄວາມ (ກົດໝາຍ/ເອກະສານ)
meaning list.sentence: Article 5 explains the terms of the agreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມາດຕາ 5 ອະທິບາຍເງື່ອນໄຂຂອງສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດຕະກອນ, ຈິດຕະກອນ
meaning list.sentence: The artist displayed his paintings in the gallery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈິດຕະກອນໄດ້ວາງສະແດງຮູບແຕ້ມຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງວາງສະແດງ.

meaning list.sentence: She works as a teacher.

meaning list.sentence: He likes to lie on the grass in the park.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຕອບສະຫນອງ, ເພື່ອຕອບສະຫນອງ

meaning list.sentence: The room is 5 metres wide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງແມ່ນກວ້າງ 5 ແມັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວລາທ່ຽງຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: She went to bed at midnight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຂົ້ານອນໃນເວລາທ່ຽງຄືນ.

meaning list.sentence: The nearest town is 10 miles away.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງທີ່ໃກ້ທີ່ສຸດແມ່ນ 10 ກິໂລແມັດ.

meaning list.sentence: He drinks a glass of milk every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວດື່ມນົມຈອກນຶ່ງທຸກໆເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: There are over a million stars visible tonight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາມາດເຫັນດາວໄດ້ຫຼາຍກວ່າໜຶ່ງລ້ານດວງໃນຄືນນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The bus will arrive in five minutes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດເມຈະມາຮອດໃນຫ້ານາທີ.

meaning list.sentence: I miss the days we spent together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຄິດຮອດມື້ທີ່ພວກເຮົາໃຊ້ເວລາຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: Everyone makes mistakes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກຄົນເຮັດຜິດພາດ.

meaning list.sentence: He is building a model airplane.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງສ້າງຍົນແບບຈໍາລອງ.

meaning list.sentence: This building has a modern design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານນີ້ມີການອອກແບບທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັດຈຸບັນ, ເວລາ
meaning list.sentence: I’ll call you in a moment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະໂທຫາເຈົ້າທັນທີ.

meaning list.sentence: The meeting is scheduled for Monday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ກໍາ​ນົດ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ວັນ​ຈັນ​.

meaning list.sentence: He saved enough money to buy a car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຢັດເງິນພຽງພໍເພື່ອຊື້ລົດ.

meaning list.sentence: She will visit her family next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈະໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: I need more time to finish the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຕ້ອງການເວລາເພີ່ມເຕີມເພື່ອສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.sentence: We went for a walk in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ໄປຍ່າງຫຼິ້ນໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼາຍທີ່ສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: She is the most talented singer in the group.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກຮ້ອງທີ່ມີພອນສະຫວັນທີ່ສຸດໃນກຸ່ມ.

meaning list.sentence: Her mother is a great cook.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ຂອງລາວເປັນພໍ່ຄົວທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.sentence: We climbed a tall mountain last weekend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ້າຍອາທິດຜ່ານມານີ້ ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ປີນພູສູງ.

meaning list.sentence: A small mouse ran across the kitchen floor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນູນ້ອຍແລ່ນຂ້າມພື້ນເຮືອນຄົວ.

meaning list.sentence: Open your mouth and say 'ah'.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປີດປາກຂອງທ່ານແລະເວົ້າວ່າ 'ah'.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຍ້າຍ, ຍ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to move to a bigger house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດສິນໃຈຍ້າຍໄປເຮືອນໃຫຍ່ກວ່າ.

meaning list.sentence: We watched an exciting movie last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ເບິ່ງຮູບເງົາທີ່ຫນ້າຕື່ນເຕັ້ນໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.sentence: I don’t have much time to prepare.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ມີເວລາຫຼາຍໃນການກະກຽມ.

meaning list.sentence: My mum made my favorite dish for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ຂອງຂ້ອຍເຮັດອາຫານທີ່ຂ້ອຍມັກສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.sentence: We visited the art museum yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມພິພິທະພັນສິລະປະມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: She enjoys listening to classical music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຟັງດົນຕີຄລາສສິກ.

meaning list.sentence: You must finish your work before lunch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງສຳເລັດວຽກຂອງເຈົ້າກ່ອນອາຫານທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດຝັງດິນ
meaning list.sentence: This is my favorite book.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນປື້ມທີ່ຂ້ອຍມັກທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.sentence: What is your name?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຊື່ຫຍັງ?

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: They named their baby Emma.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຕັ້ງ​ຊື່​ລູກ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ Emma.

meaning list.sentence: This product is made from natural ingredients.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນນີ້ແມ່ນຜະລິດຈາກສ່ວນປະກອບທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.sentence: The school is near the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She lives in a near village.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອາໄສຢູ່ໃນບ້ານໃກ້ຄຽງ.

meaning list.sentence: We will stop near the gas station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈະຢຸດຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບປໍ້ານໍ້າມັນ.

meaning list.sentence: Do you need any help?
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: He always sees the negative side of things.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຫັນດ້ານລົບຂອງສິ່ງຕ່າງໆຢູ່ສະ ເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອນບ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: Our neighbour invited us for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພື່ອນບ້ານຂອງພວກເຮົາເຊີນພວກເຮົາໄປກິນເຂົ້າແລງ.

meaning list.sentence: I will never forget this day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈະບໍ່ມີວັນລືມມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: I bought a new car last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຊື້ລົດໃຫມ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.sentence: Did you hear the good news?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວດີບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: She reads the newspaper every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອ່ານຫນັງສືພິມທຸກໆເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ໄປ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Our next class is at 10 a.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດຮຽນຕໍ່ໄປຂອງພວກເຮົາແມ່ນເວລາ 10 ໂມງເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: He will speak next.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈະເວົ້າຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖັດຈາກເຈົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: She sat next to me during the movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວນັ່ງຢູ່ຂ້າງຂ້ອຍໃນລະຫວ່າງຮູບເງົາ.

meaning list.sentence: She is a nice person to talk to.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຄົນດີທີ່ຈະສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.sentence: The stars look bright at night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດາວເບິ່ງສົດໃສໃນຕອນກາງຄືນ.

meaning list.sentence: She has nine books on her shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີປື້ມເກົ້າຫົວຢູ່ໃນຊັ້ນວາງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The concert starts at nineteen o’clock.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອນເສີດເລີ່ມແຕ່ເກົ້າໂມງ.

meaning list.sentence: There are ninety students in the class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີນັກຮຽນເກົ້າສິບຄົນຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ (ຄຳອຸທານ)
meaning list.sentence: No, I don’t want any coffee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່, ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຕ້ອງການກາເຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີ (ໂທເຄັນ)
meaning list.sentence: There is no milk left in the fridge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີນົມເຫຼືອຢູ່ໃນຕູ້ເຢັນ.

meaning list.sentence: No one was at home when I arrived.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີໃຜຢູ່ເຮືອນເມື່ອຂ້ອຍມາຮອດ.

meaning list.sentence: Nobody knows the answer to this question.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີໃຜຮູ້ຄໍາຕອບຂອງຄໍາຖາມນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: They live in the north of the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາອາໄສຢູ່ໃນພາກເຫນືອຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໜືອ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The north wind is very cold today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົມ​ເໜືອ​ໜາວ​ຫຼາຍ​ໃນ​ມື້​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປທາງທິດເໜືອ
meaning list.sentence: They are driving north.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າກຳລັງມຸ່ງໜ້າໄປທາງທິດເໜືອ.

meaning list.sentence: Her nose is red because of the cold weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດັງຂອງລາວແດງຍ້ອນອາກາດໜາວ.

meaning list.sentence: I am not tired.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ເມື່ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: He wrote a note to remind himself.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນບັນທຶກເພື່ອເຕືອນຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.sentence: There’s nothing in the fridge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີຫຍັງຢູ່ໃນຕູ້ເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດືອນພະຈິກ
meaning list.sentence: The event is scheduled for November.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນໄດ້ວາງແຜນໄວ້ໃນເດືອນພະຈິກ.

meaning list.sentence: I am busy right now.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຫຍຸ້ງຢູ່ດຽວນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: Please write your phone number here.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຂຽນເບີໂທລະສັບຂອງເຈົ້າຢູ່ບ່ອນນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The nurse is checking the patient’s blood pressure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາບານກໍາລັງກວດເບິ່ງຄວາມດັນເລືອດຂອງຄົນເຈັບ.

meaning list.sentence: This object is made of metal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັດຖຸນີ້ແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍໂລຫະ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວລາ (ຊີ້ບອກເວລາທີ່ແນ່ນອນ)
meaning list.sentence: The train arrives at six o’clock.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟມາຮອດ 6 ໂມງແລງ.

meaning list.sentence: The leaves turn yellow in October.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບປ່ຽນເປັນສີເຫຼືອງໃນເດືອນຕຸລາ.

meaning list.sentence: The roof of the house is red.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫລັງຄາເຮືອນແມ່ນສີແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The lights are off in the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟໃນຫ້ອງຖືກປິດ.

meaning list.sentence: He fell off the ladder.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລົ້ມລົງຂັ້ນໄດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້ອງການ, ໂຕະ
meaning list.sentence: She works in an office in the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງການໃນໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.sentence: They often go for a walk in the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າມັກໄປຍ່າງຫຼິ້ນໃນສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂອ້! (ຄຳອຸທານ)
meaning list.sentence: Oh! I forgot my keys at home.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂອ້! ຂ້ອຍລືມກະແຈຢູ່ເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກລົງ (ຄຳອຸທານ)
meaning list.sentence: OK, let’s meet at 5 p.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: OK, ພົບກັນ 5 ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດີ, ເໝາະສົມ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The plan seems OK to me.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການເບິ່ງຄືວ່າເຫມາະສົມກັບຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກົ່າ, ເກົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: This is an old book from my childhood.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນປື້ມເກົ່າຈາກໄວເດັກຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: The phone is on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂທລະສັບຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.sentence: The lights are on in the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງແມ່ນເປີດ.

meaning list.sentence: I visit my grandparents once a month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄປຢາມພໍ່ເຖົ້າຂອງຂ້ອຍເດືອນລະເທື່ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນຶ່ງ (ຈໍານວນ)
meaning list.sentence: There is only one apple left in the basket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫຼືອແຕ່ຫມາກໂປມອັນດຽວຢູ່ໃນກະຕ່າ.

meaning list.sentence: One should always be kind to others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຮົາຄວນມີຄວາມເມດຕາຕໍ່ຜູ້ອື່ນສະເໝີ.

meaning list.sentence: Chop the onion finely for the salad.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສໍາລັບສະຫຼັດ, ລະອຽດຟັກຜັກບົ່ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອນລາຍ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This store offers online shopping options.

meaning list.meaning: ດ່ຽວ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)

meaning list.sentence translation: ປ່ອງຢ້ຽມເປີດຢູ່ເພາະມັນຮ້ອນຢູ່ພາຍໃນ.

meaning list.sentence: Please open the door for me.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເປີດປະຕູໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)

meaning list.sentence: Do you want tea or coffee?

meaning list.sentence: I bought some oranges from the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຊື້ໝາກກ້ຽງຈາກຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.sentence: It’s raining outside.

meaning list.sentence: There’s a bridge over the river.

meaning list.sentence: They play football in the park.

meaning list.sentence: He is the best player on the team.

meaning list.sentence: The police arrived at the scene quickly.

meaning list.sentence: The hotel has a large swimming pool.

meaning list.sentence: This song is very popular among teenagers.

meaning list.sentence: She always has a positive attitude.

meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາມີເວລາທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.sentence: Do you know the meaning of this word?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຮູ້ຄວາມໝາຍຂອງຄຳນີ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: She works at a bank.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນທະນາຄານ.

meaning list.sentence: I have a lot of work to do today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍມີວຽກຫຼາຍທີ່ຕ້ອງເຮັດໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ພະນັກງານ, ພະນັກງານ
meaning list.sentence: The workers are on strike for better wages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານກຳລັງປະທ້ວງເພື່ອຂໍຄ່າຈ້າງທີ່ດີຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: The world is facing climate change challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກກໍາລັງປະເຊີນກັບສິ່ງທ້າທາຍຂອງການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດ.

meaning list.sentence: I would go to the beach if it weren’t raining.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າມັນບໍ່ຝົນຕົກ, ຂ້ອຍຈະໄປຫາດຊາຍ.

meaning list.sentence: Please write your name on the form.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຂຽນຊື່ຂອງເຈົ້າໃສ່ໃນແບບຟອມ.

meaning list.sentence: She is a famous writer of children’s books.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ຂຽນຫນັງສືເດັກນ້ອຍທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.sentence: Her writing has inspired many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດຂຽນຂອງລາວມີອິດທິພົນຕໍ່ປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.sentence: Your answer is wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາຕອບຂອງເຈົ້າຜິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແມ່ນແລ້ວ (ບໍ່ເປັນທາງການ)
meaning list.sentence: Yeah, I’d love to join you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ນແລ້ວ, ຂ້ອຍຢາກເຂົ້າຮ່ວມເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: I haven’t seen her in a year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ເຫັນລາວເປັນເວລາ ໜຶ່ງ ປີແລ້ວ.

meaning list.sentence: She wore a yellow dress to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງນຸ່ງຊຸດສີເຫຼືອງໄປງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສີເຫລືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Yellow is her favorite color.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສີເຫຼືອງແມ່ນສີທີ່ລາວມັກ.

meaning list.sentence: Yes, I’ll come to the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ນແລ້ວ, ຂ້ອຍຈະມາປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.sentence: I went to the park yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄປສວນສາທາລະນະມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ມື້ວານນີ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Yesterday was a very busy day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ວານນີ້ເປັນມື້ທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າ, ເຈົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: You are my best friend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າເປັນຫມູ່ທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: She is too young to drive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍັງອ່ອນເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະຂັບລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອງເຈົ້າ,ຂອງເຈົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: Is this your bag?
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນກະເປົາຂອງເຈົ້າບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວທ່ານເອງ, ຕົວທ່ານເອງ
meaning list.sentence: You should take care of yourself.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຄວນດູແລຕົວເອງ.
